q1: France is one of my favorite football team
a1: They are fun to watch and i'm very sympathetic to their players.
q2: Do you think they deserved to win the World Cup?
a2: Yes, I totally agree that France deserved to win the world cup
q3: I very much agree that France won the cup with enough authority
a3: There weren't really any other teams that meshed as well together as the French team did.
a4: They must have a very good chance, but four years is a long time.
q5: What improvements do you think France need to make to win?
a5: More aggression will certainly help and their balls handling skills.
